category.name: SocialCollaboration.AWC
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: S2clNotificationPreferences
preference.preference_description: Defines the notification category and preferences. The format of this multi-value preference is as follows :"category name=pref value;pref name^pref value;pref name^pref value" New categories can to be added with a set of values to the multi-value preference.
